introduction: Good morning/afternoon/evening. My name is [Name] from Market Trends, Inc., a public opinion research company. We are conducting a public opinion survey in this mall and I would like to ask you a few short questions.

questions.question: What is your age? Are you between the ages of 21 and 35, younger or older?
Does any immediate family work for: (READ CHOICES)
options: A company manufacturing, selling or distributing beer, wine or other alcoholic beverages - TERMINATE
A company manufacturing, selling or distributing tobacco products - TERMINATE

questions.question: Did you (READ EACH CHOICE):
options: Drink a glass of wine? Yes/No
Have a glass of beer? Yes/No

questions.question: About how many cigarettes do you smoke in an average day? Would you say: (READ CHOICES)
